inclusion.criterion: have all the necessary signs for a PNA diagnosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: whose ranking to PNA-1, PNA or PNA-2-3 is possible
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Of a spontaneous pain of one or both sides
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Pain caused to the costovertebral angle
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: quote: 'tenderness on palpation of both costovertebral angles'

inclusion.criterion: And presence of leukocyturia GB/mm3 ≥ 10 with or without nitriturie
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: quote: 'The urine culture showed Gram-negative rod-shaped bacterial cells, leukocytes, and leukocyte casts'

inclusion.criterion: Imaging examination at least abdominopelvic ultrasound (EAP) or CT, excluding any other possible diagnoses
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Any suspected nosocomial PNA, defined as any PNA appeared within 48 hours of discharge from a medical institution
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant or lactating women because they are also mother-child care
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: quote: 'The patients is a 25-year-old G1 P1 pregnant woman'

exclusion.criterion: Patients refusing to provide reliable contact information, especially phone number
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has fever and chills, accompanied by nausea and vomiting. She also complains of dysuria, urgency and frequency. The urine culture showed Gram-negative rod-shaped bacterial cells, leukocytes, and leukocyte casts.
